name: G:10 and D-0m's Portal Hopping Visual Novel Adventure
name_original: G:10 and D-0m's Portal Hopping Visual Novel Adventure
description:
Hi! This is a visual novel game that I made for my Advanced Sound Design Class for Games. For the final project we were tasked with making a game featuring entirely original sound effects and music. I made all of the music, sound effects, art, and also came up with the story and did the programming. This is my first major solo project so I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

Alt+F4: End Game

Right Arrow Key: Next Page
